original_title: lPL Season 5 confirmed to proceed amidst ownership transition
original_body_lines: Innovative Production Group FZE (IPG), the Event Rights Partner of the Lanka Premier League (LPL), has affirmed that despite recent developments with regards to the arrest of a co-owner of the Dambulla franchise, LPL Season 5 will proceed as planned.

According to IPG's media release, LPL Season 5 will adhere to its original schedule and feature a full roster of matches, showcasing the talents of five teams. Despite the changes in ownership within the Dambulla franchise, the team is set to participate under new ownership.
